data.name: Banner Of Blood
data.detailed_description:
The capital calls for aid. The people of Konvila will not stand alone. But after witnessing the horrifying scene of the baron‘s death. Your army was routed. As the highest-ranking officer survived, it is down to you, captain, to lead your people and reform the line. You must continue the task and defend the banner at all costs.



The Banner Of Blood is a medieval fantasy game with action and base-building elements. Players will find themselves facing the ever-growing forces of evil. Their courage and powerful relics enable them to fight off armies of formidable foes.

  • Build your camp to regain your strength.
  • Make your way through the vast orc-infested weald to the kingdom's heartland. Not a single journey will be the same.
  • Regroup your scattered troops, recruit volunteers, and hire mercenaries. You will need everyone who can pick up a spear.
  • Reclaim the relics lost in the chaos of war, as they will be the keys to victory.
  • Gain shaper blades and sturdier gears for you and your soldiers during the adventure.
  • Fight dreadful monsters that are in league with bloodlust orcs.
  • Permadeath - You are strong but not unkillable. Even if you were defeated eventually, you had shown courage and paved the path for the next brave soul.



  • Direct control of the captain's combat and movement.
  • Gather resources to construct your camp.
  • Give commands to your units or boost their combat strength using active tactic abilities.
  • Choose your every waypoint carefully. Watch out for the traps and other dangers that lurk in the dark.
  • Handle unexpected events. Some decisions will be tough but they have to be made.

data.short_description: This medieval fantasy base-building game allows you to lead your warriors to traverse randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card with 512 MB
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card with 1024 MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent animation and visual effects.
